text: Raymond Geoffrey Hassall (1943 - 12 March 2017), known as Ray, was an British politician. Hassall was a councillor in local government in Birmingham, England. He represented Perry Barr ward. He was a member of the Liberal Democrats party. He was also Birmingham City Council's cabinet member for leisure, sport and culture from 2006 to 2009.
